sentences.sContent: She smiled at him as he walked through the door.
sentences.sCn: 他从门口进来时，她朝他笑了。

sentences.sContent: Water will be pumped through a pipe.
I managed to squeeze through a gap in the hedge.
sentences.sCn: 我设法从篱笆上的一个缺口挤了过去。

sentences.sContent: They were suddenly plunged into darkness as the train went through a tunnel.
sentences.sCn: 火车穿过隧道，他们顿时陷入黑暗之中。

sentences.sContent: There were people standing in the doorway and I couldn’t get through.
sentences.sCn: 有人站在门口，我过不去。

phrases.pCn: 参加；经受；仔细检查；被通过
一路走过（歌词）；经过所有（歌词）

words.tran: [公路] 高速公路，[公路] 直达道路

trans.tranOther: into one side or end of an entrance, passage, hole etc and out of the other side or end
a train by which you can reach a place, without having to use other trains
